# Test basic key lookup functionality

# Start the test server
startserver

# Insert a test key
insertkey test@example.com age1qyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqs3290pe

# Lookup the key using the CLI
age-keyserver test@example.com
stdout 'age1qyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqszqgpqyqs3290pe'

# Stop the server
stopserver
